be23cf52-b7a1-478e-9bd4-0b273fd9b058.description: King-IV deals with an inclusive approach to corporate governance based on a set of fundamental principles, including corporate citizenship, stakeholder inclusivity, the organisation as an integral part of society and integrated thinking. King-IV represents an effort to move away from a compliance-focused approach to corporate governance and reporting to an action-orientated model designed to promote positive organisational change.
be23cf52-b7a1-478e-9bd4-0b273fd9b058.name: Outcomes Based Governance

badge_template_activities.title: Certificate of Competence for meeting minimum requirements.

0120019e-2659-439a-b087-af28bebd0448.description: The increasing demand for programmes to show meaningful impacts and results is leading to an increase in demand for the availability and use of programme evalution information. This course will equip you with practical experience in the design of a conceptual framework, metrics and indicators, use of evaluation analytics tools, and development and communication of an evaluation plan and results.
0120019e-2659-439a-b087-af28bebd0448.name: Programme Evaluation

badge_template_activities.title: Certificate of Competence for meeting minimum requirements.

ae50f86a-371d-4481-8557-fd8f49a24ee5.description: Society has become increasingly sensitive to ethical issues associated with research involving humans, especially the risks that research participants are exposed to during the conduct of the research. Managing ethics and integrity in the context of research management is an essential competence. This course is focused on developing the competence of research managers in facilitating the ethical and integrous conduct of research and research integrity.
ae50f86a-371d-4481-8557-fd8f49a24ee5.name: Research Ethics and Integrity

badge_template_activities.title: Certificate of Competence for meeting minimum requirements.

skills.name: Philosophy and Moral Principles of Ethics

2c6933ac-9337-416c-9fed-3240c683544e.description: Learning to manage the process and the teams who will be delivering on the project require institutions to work to develop teams who have the capability to work collaboratively to achieve the desired research goal. The course will look at the differences between different funding contracts, and introduce the requirements for successful administrative management of research funding.
2c6933ac-9337-416c-9fed-3240c683544e.name: Research Grants and Contracts Management

badge_template_activities.title: Certificate of Competence for meeting minimum requirements.

cfa1180c-8720-43df-bb11-eddf10309a8a.description: The aim of this course is to provide both practical and theoretical insight into 21st century retailing, by gaining the relevant skills to design and implement innovative retail strategies, both from a local and global perspective.
cfa1180c-8720-43df-bb11-eddf10309a8a.name: Retail Management
